message:
What do you think of this ?
How do one check if his router is vulnerable to such hacks ?
"This is important, there's a Botnet on the internet right now that will infect your PC/mobile and then infect your router then redirect all your internet traffic into a page that will say your service has stopped because you're suspected of being a robot, and will ask you to use a telecom company scratch card (etisalat, mobinil or Vodafone) to reactivate your service.
This page is a scam and untrue, when this issue happen to you just reset your router and reconfigure the configs recommended by your ISP
TEDATA doesn't need and will never verify if you're a human or a robot because they don't care.
Visual example: http://i.imgur.com/BDoSkH0.jpg
*visual example source credit goes to Eslam Ahmed Hussien*
#share
#tedata
#scam "
https://m.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=794055857378024&id=100003208508982
